original_text: Fifty men of the sons of the prophets also went and stood at some distance from them, as they both were standing by the Jordan.
korean_text: 선지자의 제자 오십 명이 가서 멀리 서서 바라보매 그 두 사람이 요단 가에 서 있더니

sentences.original_text: Fifty men of the sons of the prophets also went
sentences.korean_translation: 선지자의 아들들 중 오십 명도 또한 가서

sentences.original_text: and stood at some distance from them
as they both were standing by the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 두 사람이 요단 강가에 서 있을 때였습니다
